long_description: Headed to a yoga retreat or friend's cabin for the weekend? The women's Haiku Weekender Shoulder Bag carries all you need, and even has dedicated space for shoes and a yoga mat. Front pass-through stows a yoga mat or jacket. Roomy main compartment has a separate ventilated shoe compartment accessible by outside zip. Inside you'll also find a hanging zip pocket and 2 elastic-bound slip-in pockets. Front zip pocket keeps items handy; back slip pocket converts to a wheeled luggage sleeve. Haiku Weekender Shoulder Bag is made of recycled material and has a removable shoulder strap and 2 handles.
short_description: Headed to a yoga retreat or friend's cabin for the weekend? The women's Haiku Weekender Shoulder Bag carries all you need, and even has dedicated space for shoes and a yoga mat.
